LanguageData.SpiderGoat.label: spider goat
LanguageData.SpiderGoat.description:
A genetically engineered goat. Spliced with spider DNA, instead of milk they produce a silk-based synthread precursor. As a living synthread making machine they are very valuable.
However Spider goats are a very high maintenance domestic animal and cannot survive without human care. This is due to the goat being genetically optimized to produce silk, at the detriment of other biological functions.
